comments.author: Dr Ishmael.9685
comments.body:
Been done by a lot of people. The most popular ones are probably:

  • http://gw2hero.com/
  • http://us.gw2stuff.com/

comments.author: greedz.3754
comments.body: I’m thinking of replicating the gw2 map online, to expose events globally. Has this been done, and if not, is it possible with the current stuff that’s exposed in the API ?
